result.eng: I was working late.
result.ga: Bhí mé ag obair go déanach
result.orig: Bhí mé ag obair go déanach
result.html: Bhí mé ag obair go déanachI was working late.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí mé ag obair go déanaċI was working late.

result.eng: I usually work late at night.
result.ga: Bím ag obair déanach san oíche
result.orig: Bím ag obair déanach san oíche
result.html: Bím ag obair déanach san oícheI usually work late at night.
result.ponchtml: Bím ag obair déanaċ san oíċeI usually work late at night.

result.eng: I work late sometimes.
result.ga: Bím ag obair go déanach uaireanta
result.orig: Bím ag obair go déanach uaireanta
result.html: Bím ag obair go déanach uaireantaI work late sometimes.
result.ponchtml: Bím ag obair go déanaċ uaireantaI work late sometimes.

result.eng: Interest must be paid on any late payments.
result.ga: Caithfear ús a íoc ar aon íocaíocht atá deireanach
result.orig: Caithfear ús a íoc ar aon íocaíocht atá deireanach
result.html: Caithfear ús a íoc ar aon íocaíocht atá deireanachInterest must be paid on any late payments.
result.ponchtml: Caiṫfear ús a íoc ar aon íocaíoċt atá deireanaċInterest must be paid on any late payments.

result.eng: I went to bed late at night.
result.ga: Chuaigh mé a luí déanach san oíche
result.orig: Chuaigh mé a luí déanach san oíche
result.html: Chuaigh mé a luí déanach san oícheI went to bed late at night.
result.ponchtml: Ċuaiġ mé a luí déanaċ san oíċeI went to bed late at night.

result.eng: As usual, the bus is late.
result.ga: Mar is gnách tá moill ar an bhus
result.orig: Mar is gnách tá moill ar an bhus
result.html: Mar is gnách tá moill ar an bhusAs usual, the bus is late.
result.ponchtml: Mar is gnáċ tá moill ar an ḃusAs usual, the bus is late.

result.eng: The aerplane landed late.
result.ga: Thuirling an t-eitleán go déanach
result.orig: Thuirling an t-eitleán go déanach
result.html: Thuirling an t-eitleán go déanachThe aerplane landed late.
result.ponchtml: Ṫuirling an t-eitleán go déanaċThe aerplane landed late.

result.eng: I'm sorry I'm late.
result.ga: Tá brón orm go bhfuil mé déanach
result.orig: Tá brón orm go bhfuil mé déanach
result.html: Tá brón orm go bhfuil mé déanachI'm sorry I'm late.
result.ponchtml: Tá brón orm go ḃfuil mé déanaċI'm sorry I'm late.

result.eng: The buses are running late again.
result.ga: Tá moill ar na busanna arís
result.orig: Tá moill ar na busanna arís
result.html: Tá moill ar na busanna arísThe buses are running late again.
result.ponchtml: Tá moill ar na busanna arísThe buses are running late again.

result.eng: I'm running late a little.
result.ga: Tá moill bheag orm
result.orig: Tá moill bheag orm
result.html: Tá moill bheag ormI'm running late a little.
result.ponchtml: Tá moill ḃeag ormI'm running late a little.

result.eng: It is almost certain that we will be late.
result.ga: Tá sé geall le cinnte go mbeidh moill orainn
result.orig: Tá sé geall le cinnte go mbeidh moill orainn
result.html: Tá sé geall le cinnte go mbeidh moill orainnIt is almost certain that we will be late.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé geall le cinnte go mbeiḋ moill orainnIt is almost certain that we will be late.

result.eng: It is late.
result.ga: Tá sé mall
result.orig: Tá sé mall
result.html: Tá sé mallIt is late.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé mallIt is late.

result.eng: I am late each day to university.
result.ga: Bím mall 'chuile lá ag teacht chuig an ollscoil
result.orig: Bím mall 'chuile lá ag teacht chuig an ollscoil
result.html: Bím mall 'chuile lá ag teacht chuig an ollscoilI am late each day to university.
result.ponchtml: Bím mall 'ċuile lá ag teaċt ċuig an ollscoilI am late each day to university.

result.eng: Are you late waking up each morning?
result.ga: An mbíonn tú mall ag éirí 'chuile mhaidin
result.orig: An mbíonn tú mall ag éirí 'chuile mhaidin
result.html: An mbíonn tú mall ag éirí 'chuile mhaidinAre you late waking up each morning?
result.ponchtml: An mbíonn tú mall ag éirí 'ċuile ṁaidinAre you late waking up each morning?

result.eng: I only live five minutes from the college, but still I am very late.
result.ga: Níl an teach ach cúig nóiméad ón ollscoil ach fós bíonn an-mhoill orm
result.orig: Níl an teach ach cúig nóiméad ón ollscoil ach fós bíonn an-mhoill orm
result.html: Níl an teach ach cúig nóiméad ón ollscoil ach fós bíonn an-mhoill ormI only live five minutes from the college, but still I am very late.
result.ponchtml: Níl an teaċ aċ cúig nóiméad ón ollscoil aċ fós bíonn an-ṁoill ormI only live five minutes from the college, but still I am very late.

result.eng: Do you go home late?
result.ga: An dtéann tú abhaile go déanach
result.orig: An dtéann tú abhaile go déanach
result.html: An dtéann tú abhaile go déanachDo you go home late?
result.ponchtml: An dtéann tú aḃaile go déanaċDo you go home late?

result.eng: I'd love to but  I'll be working late.
result.ga: Ba bhreá liom ach beidh mé ag obair déanach
result.orig: Ba bhreá liom ach beidh mé ag obair déanach
result.html: Ba bhreá liom ach beidh mé ag obair déanachI'd love to but I'll be working late.
result.ponchtml: Ba ḃreá liom aċ beiḋ mé ag obair déanaċI'd love to but I'll be working late.

result.eng: I have to go, or I'll be late.
result.ga: Caithfidh mé imeacht nó beidh mé deireanach
result.orig: Caithfidh mé imeacht nó beidh mé deireanach
result.html: Caithfidh mé imeacht nó beidh mé deireanachI have to go, or I'll be late.
result.ponchtml: Caiṫfiḋ mé imeaċt nó beiḋ mé deireanaċI have to go, or I'll be late.

result.eng: I watch TV till late at night.
result.ga: Bím ag amharc ar an teilifís go deireanach san oíche
result.orig: Bím ag amharc ar an teilifís go deireanach san oíche
result.html: Bím ag amharc ar an teilifís go deireanach san oícheI watch TV till late at night.
result.ponchtml: Bím ag aṁarc ar an teilifís go deireanaċ san oíċeI watch TV till late at night.

result.eng: We were scared shitless that the bus would be late.
result.ga: Bhí eagla ár gcraicinn orainn go gcuirfidís moill ar an mbus
result.orig: Bhí eagla ár gcraicinn orainn go gcuirfidís moill ar an mbus
result.html: Bhí eagla ár gcraicinn orainn go gcuirfidís moill ar an mbusWe were scared shitless that the bus would be late.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí eagla ár gcraicinn orainn go gcuirfidís moill ar an mbusWe were scared shitless that the bus would be late.

result.eng: The building collapsed unexpectedly in late afternoon that day.
result.ga: Thit an foirgneamh go talamh gan choinne i ndeireadh tráthnóna an lae úid
result.orig: Thit an foirgneamh go talamh gan choinne i ndeireadh tráthnóna an lae úid
result.html: Thit an foirgneamh go talamh gan choinne i ndeireadh tráthnóna an lae úidThe building collapsed unexpectedly in late afternoon that day.
result.ponchtml: Ṫit an foirgneaṁ go talaṁ gan ċoinne i ndeireaḋ tráṫnóna an lae úidThe building collapsed unexpectedly in late afternoon that day.
